thread.title: All hell breaks loose! Akhilesh-Rahul's wagon fails to reach destination, then their stage collapses
thread.title_full: All hell breaks loose! Akhilesh-Rahul's wagon fails to reach destination, then their stage collapses - The Financial Express

author: FE Online
title: All hell breaks loose! Akhilesh-Rahul's wagon fails to reach destination, then their stage collapses
text:
stage prepared for public gathering of the two leaders in city’s Gol Park collapsed just before the two leaders were about to reach the venue. (PTI) All hell broke loose on Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Akhilesh Yadav and Congress vice president Rahul Gandhi as the duo embarked on their ‘Vijay Rath Yatra’ election campaign road-show on Tuesday. While everything went as planned for the two leaders till evening, their road-show was came to a halt at 5 pm as District Magistrate ordered to wrap the show citing election code of conduct. Rahul, who had stayed in Sangam Nagri overnight, was joined by the Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister for their road show, which commenced at the Balson Chauraha (crossing) facing the historic Anand Bhawan.
Meanwhile, the stage prepared for public gathering of the two leaders in city’s Gol Park collapsed just before the two leaders were about to reach the venue. No casualties were reported, however, the gathering and leaders’ address couldn’t take place. Meanwhile, BJP President Amit Shah also conducted a road show in the city.
#WATCH : Gol Park stage collapses, Akhilesh Yadav & Rahul Gandhi were to address from here after joint roadshow in Allahabad #UPPolls2017 pic.twitter.com/doIHdUAxE2
— ANI UP (@ANINewsUP) February 21, 2017
